string-array.name: food_descriptions
string-array.item: Solkadhi is a refreshing drink made from kokum and coconut milk. (Quantity: 1 glass)
Buttermilk is a tangy, spiced yogurt-based drink. (Quantity: 1 glass)
Shrikhand is a sweet dessert made from hung curd and sugar. (Quantity: 1 bowl)
Gulab Jamun is a syrupy dessert made of deep-fried milk balls. (Quantity: 2 pieces)
Basundi is a thick, sweetened milk dessert flavored with cardamom. (Quantity: 1 bowl)
Egg Curry is a spicy curry with boiled eggs. (Quantity: 2 eggs + curry)
Fish Curry is a coastal-style fish curry with spices and coconut. (Quantity: 1 portion)
Paneer is soft cottage cheese cooked in gravy. (Quantity: 1 bowl)
Veg Kolhapuri is a spicy mixed vegetable curry from Kolhapur. (Quantity: 1 bowl)
Chicken Curry is a traditional spiced curry with chicken pieces. (Quantity: 1 portion)
Mutton Curry is a rich, spicy curry made with tender mutton. (Quantity: 1 portion)
Veg Thali includes dal, sabji, rice, chapati, and dessert. (Quantity: 1 full plate)
Chicken Thali includes chicken curry, rice, chapati, and dessert. (Quantity: 1 full plate)
Mutton Thali includes mutton curry, rice, chapati, and dessert. (Quantity: 1 full plate)
Chapati is a soft, unleavened flatbread made from wheat flour. (Quantity: 1 piece)
Roti is a dry, round Indian flatbread. (Quantity: 1 piece)
Butter Roti is roti brushed with butter for extra taste. (Quantity: 1 piece)
Plain Rice is steamed white rice, soft and fluffy. (Quantity: 1 bowl)
Masala Rice is spiced rice cooked with herbs and vegetables. (Quantity: 1 bowl)
